<@U044SKGT4R5>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Staging TPT: Subscribable Addons turning to oneOff Addons`
*Topic:* `Homepage`
*Description:* `Hi Team, 
We are working on Subscribable Addons feature, so far no changes are merged from our side. But we noticed a behaviour in TPT on staging 
1-) Select Subscribable Addons -> it sets preselectedQuantity to the /gw/subscribable-addons/selection (However it fails)
2-) Refresh the page 
3-) Check menus service all preselectable Items are turned to oneOff. 

Could you please let me know if this is a known issue or something potentially flaky in the environment?`
*Expected behaviour:* `1-) Should add selected preselectableQuantity 2-) If endpoint fails, then nothing should change in menu service`
*Actual behaviour:* `N/A `

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue
attachments.text:
<@U044SKGT4R5>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Staging TPT: Subscribable Addons turning to oneOff Addons`
*Topic:* `Homepage`
*Description:* `Hi Team, 
We are working on Subscribable Addons feature, so far no changes are merged from our side. But we noticed a behaviour in TPT on staging 
1-) Select Subscribable Addons -> it sets preselectedQuantity to the /gw/subscribable-addons/selection (However it fails)
2-) Refresh the page 
3-) Check menus service all preselectable Items are turned to oneOff. 

Could you please let me know if this is a known issue or something potentially flaky in the environment?`
*Expected behaviour:* `1-) Should add selected preselectableQuantity 2-) If endpoint fails, then nothing should change in menu service`
*Actual behaviour:* `N/A `

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue

Hey Madeeha :wave:,
Looks like you reached the 2nd staging flakiness (preSelectedQuantity value sets to zero on the second failure attempt) issue from our previous conversation around the subscribable add-ons selection API :sweat_smile:.

This issue is not reproducible on live.

elements.text: Hey Madeeha

,

<@U08FY485B47>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `E2E Tests changeMeals failing`
*Topic:* `Other`
*Description:* `Hi team!

I have a PR open that is failing because of the changeMeals E2E. I was running it a few times, locally and also on my PR to check the details.

I found that previously that E2E was  part of a quarantine. 

<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/54371>

<https://github.com/hellofresh/web/pull/53927/files>

Please could you help me to check if it's failing for you? I think this could block other teams when that E2E runs.`
*Expected behaviour:* `E2E for changeMeals passing`
*Actual behaviour:* `It's failing because:


CypressError: Timed out retrying after 15050ms: cy.click() failed because this element is disabled:

<button data-testid="select-recipe-cta" aria-disabled="true" aria-busy="false" height="auto" display="flex" cursor="pointer" data-zest="petstable" class="sc-dfc6cfb5-0 byppmC" disabled="">...</button>

Fix this problem, or use {force: true} to disable error checking.

<https://on.cypress.io/element-cannot-be-interacted-with>`

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue

<@UFC7CRXMZ>: Hi, I want to report a new issue. Please check the details.
*Issue:* `Customer Issue`
*Topic:* `Menu & Recipes`
*Description:* `Hi. A high value loyal customer has reached out to me on LinkedIn as they've had some issues with meal swap and receiving missing meals. Normally, this would just be an Ops/CC issue but we've been facing tech issues with meal swap so I wanted to flag here so we could investigate what happened with both tech and ops involved. Please could you investigate this customer example and see what went wrong i.e.
- did they receive the wrong meals due to the tech mealswap issues?
- was it something else that led to this?
- how we can we ensure they get the right meals going forwards?

I'll copy details of the conversation on LinkedIn with the customer in the thread.

Thanks!`
*Expected behaviour:* `na`
*Actual behaviour:* `na`

*Category:* squad-nv-pet-food
*Command:* pet-food-issue
attachments.text:

_thread_replies.text:
Customer discussion on LinkedIn:
Jeanine Henry - Senior Director, Product & Technical Support @ Meta

Tuesday
Jeanine Henry sent the following message at 4:48 PM

Customer Support Disaster
Hi Laurent,

I have been a loyal customer of The Pets Table for several years now. For the last three months, I have experienced challenge after challenge with my delivery.

In May, I was missing 7 packets of food.
In June, I was missing 7 packets of food.

As a result, I have ordered packets from Chewy at a much higher cost and a huge inconvenience.

I have contacted customer support several times to figure out what is going on, and they just continue to offer me credits. I am 100% certain that my July deliver is going to be incorrect and I am sure the customer support team changed by order to something completely different because there is an actual inventory problem.

What do you recommend a customer do in this situation?

I've reached out on social media as well because support is so ineffective.

I really hope to hear from you.

Thank you,
Jeanine

Laurent Guillemain sent the following messages at 5:22 PM

Hi Jeanine. Sorry to hear this - its odd for this to happen one off but for it to keep occurring is very strange so let me look into this for you. Can you please share with me your subscription ID which is in grey at the top of the plan settings page in your account? Thanks! Laurent

Laurent Guillemain   5:23 PM
And pls also let me know what recipes and what number of packets you think you should be getting? Thanks!

Jeanine Henry sent the following message at 7:47 PM

Hi Laurent,

Thank you for the speedy response. I really appreciate it.

Here is my information:
Subscription ID: 2937354

I believe the problem started when I changed my meal plan from: Chicken Casserole, Beef Stew and Turkey Casserole

To Chicken Casserole, Beef Stew and Chicken Entree with Brown Rice.

The box in May was missing 7 meals and so I only received Chicken Casserole and Beef Stew. No turkey or chicken with rice.

In June, the same thing occurred.

I called support again to report the issue to ensure the July box contained 21 packets with the correct selections, and all of a sudden, I somehow have an order of only Chicken Casserole.

Thanks for taking the time to help with this issue.

Cheers,
Jeanine(Edited)

Laurent Guillemain sent the following message at 8:05 PM

Ok thanks. Will get back to you asap.

Apologies again

L

Jeanine Henry sent the following messages at 9:51 PM

I really appreciate it.

This user (Subscription ID: 2937354) was part of the SKU migrations (Fresh 650 to Fresh 600). It was one of the cases where neither the pack composition nor the price had changed, and the timing corresponds, as the first box that she had a problem with was after the migrations.

As for the preference she is on, I see that
 The May and June boxes were with  fresh-chickenXfresh-beefXfresh-turkey
 The July box was with fresh-chickenXdry-chicken

The change she mentions to fresh-chickenXfresh-beefXfresh-chicken-rice didnt went through.


<!subteam^S05K3MZSD55>, could you please take it from here and check why the preference defaulted to chickenxchicken in July?

_thread_replies.text:
Well done all. Here's the response from the customer.

Hi Laurent,

I really appreciate your transparency and the detailed explanation of what happened - I totally get it. I've been in operations and customer support for most of my career, so understand that things happen. I love helping to solve an edge case.

I'm also very grateful for the solution. Works for us. Riley is almost 14 years old and changing food is disruptive to his health, so thank you.

I'm probably more critical than most because of my background, so take this with a grain of salt.
- I literally had to research and find the CEO of the company to get to the root cause of the problem and have the problem fixed.
- Customer support had no information to understand the root cause of the problem, and no agency to resolve the it.
- I probably called or chatted with support five or six times, they promised to contact me back and track it down, with literally no follow-up.
- I would have canceled my subscription had you not stepped in because no one could help, and that would be a shame. How many customers are you losing because your support is failing them?

I have also subscribed to Nom Nom and Farmer's Dog, but my dog has highly preferred Pets Table. His health and energy I have had a wonderful experience up until now and want you to win. Nom Nom's customer support had the ability to send out replacements within days and covered the costs.

I may have opted out of your marketing emails, but I would have loved to learn more about new recipes and the ability to update his selections.

Okay - that's it from me! Thank you, thank you for helping me resolve this problem (but probably not a good use of CEO time to do customer support. LOL).

Have wonderful week / weekend!

Cheers,
Jeanine

elements.text:

I have also subscribed to Nom Nom and Farmer's Dog, but my dog has highly preferred Pets Table. His health and energy I have had a wonderful experience up until now and want you to win. Nom Nom's customer support had the ability to send out replacements within days and covered the costs.

Okay - that's it from me! Thank you, thank you for helping me resolve this problem (but probably not a good use of CEO time to do customer support. LOL).

Have wonderful week / weekend!

Cheers,
Jeanine

_thread_replies.text: the way order processing works there is a katana run in the morning (11am) based on the initial scm export that is generated. <@U0139TY5FDF> we have investigated logs once again, and we noticed that there is one trace of meal selection "1" when its being fixed - we assume this is when you interacted with BOB to fix the problem. There is no trace within BOB of anyone setting it to 1. Actually 56 was the selection all the way since the time the subscription was set as TMX

I also see this user was marked by the CC for reset trial-box. So it was processed by our script, however the way we do it would NOT change the plan from TFR to TMX - and this is the case with this user. We suspect this anomaly may have had impact on the meal selection. We are trying to investigate it from that angle now.

<@U01PE2S4ZL6>: Hi, I'd like to ask a question! Please check the details.
*Question title:* `Unknown source of meal change`
*Topic:* `Meal Selection Service`
*Details:* `We are have recorded a case of a user with an unknown source of their meal change. We are trying to understand what it caused it. The subscription ID is 3088598. What we know is that user was on meal selection 65 on 06.29, and then somewhere within next 4 days the selection switched to 1. We have limited visibility over that, no log of that change is present in bob. Could someone please help us to look into logs, or let us know how to find out what was the source of that change? `

*Category:* squad-cart-foundation
*Command:* cart-foundation-question
attachments.text:
<@U01PE2S4ZL6>: Hi, I'd like to ask a question! Please check the details.
*Question title:* `Unknown source of meal change`
*Topic:* `Meal Selection Service`
*Details:* `We are have recorded a case of a user with an unknown source of their meal change. We are trying to understand what it caused it. The subscription ID is 3088598. What we know is that user was on meal selection 65 on 06.29, and then somewhere within next 4 days the selection switched to 1. We have limited visibility over that, no log of that change is present in bob. Could someone please help us to look into logs, or let us know how to find out what was the source of that change? `
